entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
